long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Join Mario on an unforgettable adventure in the classic platformer, Super Mario! Explore vibrant worlds, dodge tricky obstacles, and defeat enemies as you navigate through iconic levels to rescue Princess Peach from the clutches of Bowser. Collect power-ups like the Super Mushroom and Fire Flower to enhance Mario's abilities, and uncover hidden secrets along the way. With its timeless gameplay, challenging levels, and beloved characters, Super Mario delivers endless fun for players of all ages. Are you ready to jump, run, and save the Mushroom Kingdom? Let the adventure begin!
